channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Dragnet for a Spy
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Thorne Lee)
item.description: Enemy agents were making a shambles of Operation Topside's super secret — until a lowly lieutenant proved that an ounce of brains was worth a pound of brass.
